abstract.para:
Note: This document lists changes only since the 1.75.0 release. If you instead want a record of the complete list of changes for the codebase over its entire history, you can obtain one by running the following commands:
svn checkout https://docbook.svn.sourceforge.net/svnroot/docbook/trunk/xsl svn log --xml --verbose xsl > ChangeHistory.xml

sect1.title: Release Notes: 1.75.1
sect1.para: The following is a list of changes that have been made since the 1.75.0 release.

sect2.title: FO
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the fo code since the 1.75.0 release.

screen.phrase: Switching to em dash for character before attribution in epigraph; resolves Bug #2793878
Fixed bug 2789947, id attribute missing on simplelist fo output.

sect2.title: HTML
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the html code since the 1.75.0 release.

screen.phrase: Switching to em dash for character before attribution in epigraph; resolves Bug #2793878
Fixed bug 2789678: apply-templates line accidentally deleted.

sect2.title: Epub
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the epub code since the 1.75.0 release.

screen.phrase: Added regression and fix to correct "bug" with namespace-prefixed container elements in META-INF/container.xml ; resolves Issue #2790017
Another attempt at flexible named entity and XInclude processing
Tweaking solution to Bug #2750442 following regression reported by Michael Wiedmann.

sect2.title: Params
sect2.para: The following changes have been made to the params code since the 1.75.0 release.

screen.phrase: Updated documentation to reflect changes made in r8419.
